Room.Name: Charybdis Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Charybdis Way between Tiamat Lane and Myrr Lane.
Room.LongDescription: A sturdy wall keeps you from the Great Observatory grounds to the east. on the west side are three pubs in a row. The northernmost pub has the the largest sign, which reads "Red Dragon Pub - Coldest Ale in the City." You have to descend some steps to get there.
